last_episode_to_air.name: Prey for Me
last_episode_to_air.overview: A housewife plans to seduce a youth pastor and convince him to kill her crippled husband.

name: Wicked Attraction
overview: Wicked Attraction is a true-crime documentary television series on Investigation Discovery which began airing in the United States in 2008. The series focuses on how two seemingly ordinary people can come together to commit heinous crimes, thereby forming a "wicked attraction."

episodes.name: The Perfect Couple
episodes.overview: Newlyweds Paul and Karla Homolka hide a dark and deadly secret in Canada.

episodes.name: Minivan Murderers
episodes.overview: A couple satisfies their deviant urges through a series of assaults.

episodes.name: Madness of Two
episodes.overview: A dutiful daughter hatches a deadly plan with her boyfriend in Virginia.

episodes.name: Evil in the Desert
episodes.overview: A sadistic couple sets up a chamber of horrors in their New Mexico home.

episodes.name: Blood Brothers
episodes.overview: A serial killer tortures innocent victims on camera in California.

episodes.name: Home Sweet Home
episodes.overview: Wicked Attraction examines the case of Michelle and David Knotek lure guests to their Washington boardinghouse in order to murder them.

episodes.name: Evil in the Blood
episodes.overview: Wicked Attraction examines the case of Ricky Gray and Ray Dandridge who were responsible for a spree of family murders in Richmond Virginia.

episodes.name: Superstar
episodes.overview: Wicked Attraction looks at the case of former boxer Jeremy Brooks and Coty Rodriguez who commit three murders in three different states.

episodes.name: Beyond the Wire
episodes.overview: Wicked Attraction looks at the case of Carolyn King and Bradley Martin who kill a Pennsylvania florist and later kidnap and murder a woman in North Dakota.

episodes.name: Innocence Lost
episodes.overview: Wicked Attraction looks at the case of Michael Thornton who uses his young protégé Janeen Snyder to kidnap and murder two teen girls.

episodes.name: Calm Before the Storm
episodes.overview: Wicked Attraction looks at the case of Skylar Deleon and his wife Jennifer Henderson who kill a California couple and steal their yacht.

episodes.name: Shoot to Thrill
episodes.overview: Wicked Attraction looks at the case of Dale Hausner and Sam Dieteman two serial shooters who targeted the streets of Phoenix, Arizona.

episodes.name: Dial 123
episodes.overview: Wicked Attraction examines the case of Kelly Gissendaner and her lover Gregory Owen who conspire to murder Kelly's husband Doug.

episodes.name: Live Free or Die
episodes.overview: Wicked Attraction examines the case of Nicole Kasinskas who kills her mother Jeanne Dominico when she refuses to let her move in with her boyfriend Billy Sullivan.

episodes.name: Built for Murder
episodes.overview: Wicked Attractions looks at the case of bodybuilder Craig Titus and fitness model Kelly Ryan who are responsible for the murder of their assistant Melissa James.

episodes.name: 'Til Death Us Do Part
episodes.overview: After 16 years of violent abuse Deborah Brown and her children have decided to flee from her husband Steven Brown. They think they'll be safe living with Deborah's brother Don in a different state. Then one night Steven arrives to exact his revenge, and Deborah endures a night of sheer terror.

episodes.name: Dante's Inferno
episodes.overview: Masked robbers burst into a Eustis, FL bachelor party and open fire on the guests. Two men are killed and another is seriously injured after being shot ten times. The mastermind of the robbery is drug dealer Donte Hall. He enlisted the help of his stripper girlfriend Angel Glenn, who was working the party, and his identical twin brother Dante. Now police must find them before they kill again.

episodes.name: Dante's Inferno
episodes.overview: The ordeal of Lisa Fotopoulos, who survived a gunshot to the head in a botched murder-for-hire scheme.

episodes.name: Bad Fortune
episodes.overview: In the spring of 2005, prominent Vietnamese fortune teller Ha Smith and her daughter Anita Vo are found brutally stabbed to death inside their Orange County, CA home. In a puzzling twist, their killer has also poured white paint over their bodies. As detectives consider the possibility of a ritual killing, new purchases are being made on Ha Smith's credit cards. The money trail leads police to a North Carolina woman who also happens to be a client of Ha Smith.

episodes.name: No Place To Hide
episodes.overview: In the fall of 2004, police officers rescue Jennifer Hitchcock from the Wisconsin hotel room where her abusive and obsessive boyfriend, Maurice Mason, has been holding her. But Mason refuses to let her go. He recruits his nephew Bennie Frier as an accomplice and follows Jennifer to Nebraska, where he intends to get her back - no matter what. Mason tracks down his one time lover, savagely beats her, and kidnaps her. He and Frier then begin the trip back to Wisconsin. It's a trip that will find one man bound and left for dead in the wilderness, a cab driver gunned down, and Jennifer herself brutally murdered.

episodes.name: See No Evil
episodes.overview: In January of 2000 Danielle Simpson, his wife Jennifer, and a 13-year-old friend decide to rob the home of their elderly neighbor, 84-year-old widow Geraldine Davidson. They break in while she's out, but are startled when the retired school teacher returns home while they are still in her house. The trio kidnaps the elderly woman, bind her with duct tape, and force her into the trunk of her own car. They then drive around the town of Palestine, TX, stopping to show her off to friends along the way. When Danielle Simpson's younger brother Lionel joins them, he convinces the others that Geraldine must be killed.

episodes.name: Good Deeds Punished
episodes.overview: In July of 2005, elderly couple Carol and Reggie Sumner go missing from their Jacksonville, FL home. A few days later, their abandoned car turns up about an hour away from home. Then someone starts withdrawing cash from their bank accounts at ATM's in Charleston, SC, where they used to live. Investigators follow the paper trail right to Michael Jackson and Tiffany Cole. The young couple has a connection to the Sumner's. Tiffany Cole used to be their neighbor. Jackson and Cole, along with friends Alan Wade and Bruce Nixon, have committed an unspeakable crime.

episodes.name: The Golden Buddah
episodes.overview: On the night of August 9, 1991, two men break into the Buddhist temple on the outskirts of Phoenix, AZ and murder all 9 people inside. The motive appears to be robbery. Based on a tip, a special task force quickly arrests four Tucson, AZ men and charges them with the murders. But ballistics tests on a confiscated .22 rifle connect the murders to two teenagers - Jonathan Doody and Alessandro "Alex" Garcia. While being questioned, Garcia admits he and Doody are the real killers.

episodes.name: Sex, Lies, and Bloody Goodbyes
episodes.overview: Catherina Voss is obsessed by sex, men, and spending money she hasn't got. In April 2007 she decides the quickest way to a fast buck is to hire a hit man to kill her latest husband, Navy Ensign Cory Voss. As Catherina waits excitedly for the life insurance check to arrive Police begin to delve into her background, and discover her latest lover, Michael Draven, tells as many lies as she does - claiming he's a successful movie producer when in fact he's hardly worked a day in his life.

episodes.name: The Jaycee Dugard Story
episodes.overview: The ordeal of Jaycee Dugard, who was abducted at age 11 by Phillip and Nancy Garrido in 1991 and kept as a sex slave until 2009, is detailed.

episodes.name: Lesbians and the Little Man
episodes.overview: Pool hall hustler Donald Fish stands only 4 ft 4 inches and is no match for two vicious lesbians who come up with a plan to seduce him before using violence to steal his money. Will investigators be able to find the duo before they strike again?

episodes.name: Rough Diamond
episodes.overview: Two lovers are prepared to go to any lengths to pay for their next drug fix, costing over $600 a day. They decide robbing jewelry stores is the best way to get cash. Their robbing spree soon turns into a murder spree when the body count starts to add up.

episodes.name: No Sharing Allowed
episodes.overview: Two teens murder a predator and go on the run ''Thelma and Louise style'' to escape from police.

episodes.name: Lust for Life
episodes.overview: A greedy con man goes to explosive lengths while playing his game.

episodes.name: A Slice of Murder
episodes.overview: A pizza shop manager seeks revenge through a reign of terror and murder.

episodes.name: Fascination with Death
episodes.overview: Two people bond over a desire to kill and decide to unleash their disturbing fantasies.

episodes.name: House Guests From Hell
episodes.overview: An elderly Texas couple gets more than they bargained for when they allow guests with murder on the mind into their home.

episodes.name: Death Ride
episodes.overview: Out of control, mentally compromised ex-military men team up for a deadly crime spree.

episodes.name: The Power of Love
episodes.overview: A woman enlists the help of her childhood sweetheart to kill her elderly lover so she can inherit millions.

episodes.name: The Body Shifters
episodes.overview: A love struck teenage couple plot to murder the girl's mother after she interferes in their relationship.

episodes.name: Rebels with a Deadly Cause
episodes.overview: Vicious lovers from rival gangs go on a crime spree throughout the San Gabriel Valley.

episodes.name: Weapon of Mass Seduction
episodes.overview: An ex hooker and gigolo team up to seduce a car dealership.

episodes.name: Dressed to Kill
episodes.overview: Leslie Ballard wanted a more exciting life and found it with a man 20 years her senior; after getting shorted in her father's will, a woman gets revenge.

episodes.name: Love Me Tender
episodes.overview: Jealousy knows no limits as sadistic psycho Mike Murdaugh and his twisted lover Becky Rohrs brutally torment Becky's admirers.

episodes.name: A Rose Amongst Thorns
episodes.overview: The investigation leads to a missing mothers backyard.

episodes.name: Wheels of Steel
episodes.overview: Two friends kill a nurse and dump her body in a lake to steal her car.

episodes.name: Venus Guy Trap
episodes.overview: A romantic getaway between a nursing student and an aspiring rap star turns into a crime spree.

episodes.name: More Than a Babysitter
episodes.overview: A woman with a loving family becomes addicted to heroin and her life spirals out of control.

episodes.name: Mommys Little Helpers
episodes.overview: During hard times, a woman takes matters into her own hands.

episodes.name: Straight Through the Heartland
episodes.overview: A babysitting job leads from an affair to a deadly crime spree.

episodes.name: A Recipe for Disaster
episodes.overview: A couple flees from the police, but things spiral further out of control at a cousin's home.

episodes.name: Freedom Quest
episodes.overview: A woman and her childhood friend begin an affair that ends in murder.

episodes.name: The Dark Krystal
episodes.overview: A troubled teenager develops a drug addition, which drives her into a murderous rampage.

episodes.name: A Mothers Worst Nightmare
episodes.overview: When an addict falls for a compulsive con-woman, the explosive couple get involved in a series of scams from which their only escape seems to be murder. Things continue to escalate as the lovers turn on friends and become serial killers.

episodes.name: Dirty Double Cross
episodes.overview: When Bo randomly hitches a ride with C.J at a truck stop, the two become fast friends. Yet when Harvey takes Bo home to his wife and their four boys, Bo realizes he has stepped into a meth den, and the visit and friendship spiral out of control.

episodes.name: No Easy Road
episodes.overview: A visit to meet a friend's family gets out of control when the visitor realizes he's in a meth den.

episodes.name: The Cougar and Her Cub
episodes.overview: A mother and daughter with a troubled past sets off on a violent path to freedom.

episodes.name: True Bromance
episodes.overview: Two teens kill a young friend and turn the tables on his step-mom.

episodes.name: True Bromance
episodes.overview: Two teens kill a young friend and turn the tables on his step-mom.

episodes.name: Prey for Me
episodes.overview: A housewife plans to seduce a youth pastor and convince him to kill her crippled husband.
